summary:
Who could imagine that buying breezehome would also grant you access to the retreat of the great adventurer Aaron ?
This house includes all the facilities you need as an adventurer (storage, TP, crafting equipments,...)
descriptionHtml:
-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+
 Aaron\'s Retreat 1.1

 By Yottpee
-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+

I apologize for my approximative english, this is not my native language.
I would be happy to improve this mod, please make some comments.

Overview
+-+-+-+-+-
Aaron\'s retreat is a mod that adds a large house in a cliff above Markath (I love this town...).
It provides the following facilities :
 - storage (each container is secure), mannequin, weapon racks
 - crafting : all the equipments you need (enchant & alchemy tables, forge, workbench,...)
 - teleporters towards main towns
 - a ring of \"home return\" that TP into the house
 - altars, bed,...

And a few rooms for entertainment : Sauna, 3D maze, bibliotheque


Installation
+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
 - Extract the downloaded file
 - Copy the file in [Skyrim\\Data] folder, and check the esp after launching the game. 
 - Extract the scripts and copy them in [Data\\scripts] folder


Description
+-+-+-+-+-+-+
Everything is meant to be of quick access : I really aim to make it functionnal.
One main room leads to all the others rooms.
I also hope you\'ll be pleased with the different atmospheres I try to create in each room.


Enter the House
+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+
The easier way to access the house is to buy breezehome in Whiterun.
When you enter breezehome, you will be given the \"home return\" ring.
No matter if you lose it, you will be given the ring again and again.
Just equip it, and you will be TP into Aaron\'s retreat.
Go outside the main door (exit to Markath) and a marker on your map will allow fast travel to your new house.
with the console : coc aaronslair

No cheat
+-+-+-+-+
 - You won\'t find a lot of items to loot 
 - the TP ring doesn\'t work if you\'re fighting (don\'t make me believe you don\'t think of it)
 - the TP towards a town is available only if you have already visited this town.


Versions
+-+-+-+-+
 - 1.1 scripts added, pathgrid in the entrance 
 - 1.0 first version (without scripts...I apologize)
Next version : complete pathgrid, add music, maybe rooms for followers

Thanks to the people who take some time to comment
Special thanks to Loukiana

Hope you enjoy!
author: Yottpee
